about_the_game:
Prolong the From Space experience with the official game soundtrack! Tracks available in both MP3 and high-definition FLAC formats.

Music by Deon van Heerden.
Production & composition by Deon van Heerden.
Mixing & mastering by Jo Ellis.
Assistant engineering by Christian Burgess.
Additional composition by Mark Allnutt & Kristi Boonzaaier.
detailed_description:
Prolong the From Space experience with the official game soundtrack! Tracks available in both MP3 and high-definition FLAC formats.

Production & composition by Deon van Heerden.

Assistant engineering by Christian Burgess.
Additional composition by Mark Allnutt & Kristi Boonzaaier.

name: From Space - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space

short_description: YOUR MISSION: Liberate Earth from the Alien horde!
